q_en: Which cutting tasks are for products categorized as T-shirt?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM products_types WHERE description = 'T-shirt';
steps.description: Retrieve the product type ID for products categorized as 'T-shirt'

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM products WHERE products_type_id = 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products with the product type ID obtained in Step1

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 11, 19, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for the products obtained in Step2

steps.sql: SELECT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (1, 3, 11, 19, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs for the order product IDs obtained in Step3

results.input:
Retrieve the details of cutting tasks for the cutting task IDs obtained in Step4
['tool_find_cutting_task, {"cutting_task_id": <cutting_task_id>}, Find the cutting task by the cutting task ID']
results.output: I encountered an error while trying to retrieve the details of cutting tasks for the cutting task IDs obtained in Step 4. The error seems to be related to the SQL syntax. Please provide the actual cutting task IDs so that I can retry the query with the correct IDs.
